mapper.insert: insert into goods ( goods_num, goods_name, goods_Price, goods_contents) values(#{goodsNum}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsContents})
mapper.select: select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over (order by goods_num desc) as rn , goods_Num , goods_name , goods_price ,goods_contents , emp_num,goods_regist , GOODS_MAIN_IMAGE ,GOODS_MAIN_STORE_IMAGE , GOODS_DETAIL_IMAGE ,GOODS_DETAIL_STORE_IMAGE , visit_count ,update_Emp_Num , goods_Update_Date from goods ) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
